splits.name: sprite_mux_zone_split
splits.description: Sprite multiplexing background and zone split technique - raster interrupt based sprite reuse for fixed layouts, Y-coordinate timing, frame/color register writes

splits.name: sprite_mux_sorting_algorithms
splits.description: General sprite multiplexing - sorting algorithms (bubblesort, finding next lowest Y, radix sort, continuous insertion sort), performance comparisons for sorting virtual sprites by Y-coordinate

splits.name: sprite_mux_display_interrupts
splits.description: Sprite multiplexing implementation - virtual to physical sprite mapping, 9th-sprite-per-row rejection, raster interrupt code for sprite display, doublebuffering, flicker elimination techniques
